text: Ludivine is a feminine given name. Notable women with the given name include: *Ludivine Diguelman, French footballer *Ludivine Furnon, French artistic gymnast *Ludivine Henrion, Belgian road bicycle racer *Ludivine Kreutz, French professional golfer *Ludivine Lasnier (born 1985), French kickboxer *Ludivine Sagnier, French actress Category:Feminine given names
title: Ludivine
